name: Oulun kaupunki/ City of Oulu
goal: Oulu is a city and municipality of 200 000 inhabitants (2016) in the region of Northern Ostrobothnia, in Finland. It is the most populous city in Northern Finland and the fifth most populous city in the country. It is one of the northernmost larger cities in the world. As stated By Nordregio 2016, City of Oulu is the fastest growing urban region in Scandinavia. Over the past 20 years the population has grown 37 %.
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Institutional affairs, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Alue- ja rakennepolitiikka, kaupunkipolitiikka, rajat ylittävä yhteistyö
Arktinen politiikka
Itämeren politiikka
Verkkojen Eurooppa, TEN-T, TEN-E, TEN-TELE
Tutkimus- ja innovaatipolitiikka ja sen rahoitus
PK- yrityksiä koskevat toimet
Investointien rahoitus
